result.title: August Easy Challenge on HackerEarth
result.content:
Hello everyone,

I want to invite you to participate in HackerEarth August Easy Contest '15. It is 3 hour long contest scheduled on August 2. Check your timezone: Here

The link to the contest: https://www.hackerearth.com/august-easy-15/

The problem set consists of 6 algorithmic tasks with partial solutions allowed â€” you get points for every test that your solution passes. The problem set was prepared by me, tested by pkacprzak and the editorials are presented by minimario .

Top 5 beginners of the leaderboard will also get a HackerEarth T-shirt!

Good luck, everyone!

UPD : Contest has been shifted to 2nd August.
